## How to test
- Checkout branch locally:
  - `git checkout Padigos-dev` (or feature branch)
  - `npm ci && npm run dev`

## Checklist
- [ ] Code compiles and app runs locally
- [ ] No obvious console errors
- [ ] UI tested for basic flows
- [ ] Changes documented (if relevant)
